name: get-all-categories
value:
FOR category IN categories 
   RETURN {"key": category._key, "category": category.CategoryName}

name: get-all-suppliers
value:
FOR supplier IN suppliers 
   RETURN {"key": supplier._key, "companyName": supplier.CompanyName}

name: get-products
value:
LET data = (
FOR product IN products
    LIMIT @offset, @limit
    RETURN KEEP(product,
        "_key", 
        "ProductName",
        "QuantityPerUnit",
        "UnitPrice",
        "UnitsInStock",
        "UnitsOnOrder"
    )
)

RETURN {
    "totalDocuments": LENGTH(products),
    "data": data
}

name: get-product-info
value:
FOR product IN products
    FILTER product._key == @key
    LET supplier_details = (
        FOR supplier IN suppliers
        FILTER TO_STRING(product.SupplierID) == supplier._key
        RETURN {
            "_key": supplier._key, 
            "CompanyName": supplier.CompanyName
        }
    )
    RETURN {
        "_key": product._key,
        "Discontinued": product.Discontinued,
        "ProductName": product.ProductName,
        "QuantityPerUnit": product.QuantityPerUnit,
        "ReorderLevel": product.ReorderLevel,
        "Supplier": {
            "_key": supplier_details[0]._key,
            "CompanyName": supplier_details[0].CompanyName
        },
        "UnitPrice": product.UnitPrice,
        "UnitsInStock": product.UnitsInStock,
        "UnitsOnOrder": product.UnitsOnOrder
    }

name: get-supplier-info
value:
FOR supplier IN suppliers
    FILTER supplier._key == @key
    RETURN KEEP(supplier,
        "_key",
        "Address",
        "City",
        "CompanyName",
        "ContactName",
        "ContactTitle",
        "Country",
        "Phone",
        "PostalCode",
        "Region"
    )
